subs.text: My accomplishment for the day is fixing the flush on our in-wall toilet tank, which has been intermittently sticking for months. Once I dared to disassemble it, I found a loose piece of plastic inside the valve. Seems to work fine now. [link]

subs.text: @cherrysberries @gingerarab I‚Äôve had the 4 am wake-up call in Reykjavik, when we got stranded for a night due to a late flight. Then our shuttle didn‚Äôt show up and we had to organize a taxi at 4:30. üôÉ And yeah, even then the airport was chaotic and crowded early in the morning.
